location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 3-5; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file title contains an inaccurate spelling: Pradham Singh should appear as Pradhan Singh, as on folio 2. The file consists of a single letter, from Major Claude Edward Urquhart Bremner, Political Agent and HBM's Consul, Muscat, to the Secretary to the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, recommending B Pardhan [sic, actually Pradhan] Singh, Supervisor, Public Works Department, at Muscat, for appointment as Assistant Engineer, Persian Gulf Sub-Division.

name.namePart: Public Works Department, Persian Gulf Sub-Division, Assistant Engineer
